name: Waltz (steryo)
description:
Waltz has been developed for the Digital Media Art Utilizing 2D Animation course project throughout the semester. Used Gamemaker Studio 1.4 as the engine, including draw_trail extension by Killer.

How To Play:

Pick up yellow powerups by passing them over to survive through the shrinking crimson circle of death.

Controls:

W - Thrust

S - Slow down

A/D - Rotate

Left Click - Shoot

Space - Respawn

End - Toggle music

Home - Toggle fullscreen

Known bugs: 

  • Cursor leaves the playable area even if the game is fullscreen when using multiple monitors.
  • Can't toggle between the fullscreen and the windowed mode on some PCs.

Updates:

  • Fonts replaced to m5x7 by Daniel Linssen.
